title: Introduction & Discovery
description: Player meets Ravi or Nima in marketplace. First encounter reveals loss.

passages.emotional_beat: Player enters marketplace, senses unusual energy
passages.content: NARRATION_A1_P01: // Describe marketplace. Set mood. Introduce Ravi or Nima as observer.
passages.author_notes: Establish setting (Phase 2 marketplace). Player should feel the undercurrent of sadness.

passages.emotional_beat: Ravi reaches out to player. First touch of vulnerability.
passages.content: RAVI_LINE_01_INTRO: // [High Empathy variant] Ravi perceives player as listener. Reaches out.
passages.author_notes: Ravi is unsettled. He notices something in the player. This is his opening.

passages.content: RAVI_LINE_02_INTRO: // [High Skepticism variant] Ravi defensive, questioning. Testing player.
passages.author_notes: Alternative dialogue branch for skeptical player energy.

passages.content: RAVI_LINE_03_INTRO: // [Balanced variant] Ravi cautious but hopeful. Middle path.
passages.author_notes: For players with balanced TONE stats.

passages.emotional_beat: Player decides whether to engage with Ravi

choices.text: PLAYER_CHOICE_A1_C01: // Empathetic engagement (e.g., 'Tell me what you need')

passages.author_notes: High-stakes opening choice. Sets player's relationship to Ravi's crisis.

passages.emotional_beat: Ravi confesses his burden. Guilt and desperation visible.
passages.content: RAVI_LINE_04_BURDEN: // Ravi mentions Nima. Mentions Ophina (deceased). Guilt surfaces.
passages.author_notes: Core confession. 'My partner Nima lost someone. I should have...' Trembling hand with Sorrow glyph.

choices.text: PLAYER_CHOICE_A1_C04: // Ask for story (e.g., 'Tell me about Ophina')
PLAYER_CHOICE_A1_C05: // Skeptical response (e.g., 'Why should I care?')

passages.author_notes: Second choice. Branches to different emotional pathways.

passages.emotional_beat: Nima appears. First meeting of all three.
passages.content: NARRATION_A1_P02: // Nima emerges from marketplace crowd. Controlled, but eyes damaged by grief.
passages.author_notes: Transition moment. Two glyphs now visible: Sorrow (Ravi) + ghost of Remembrance (Nima).

passages.emotional_beat: Nima appears even if player was dismissive. Still moves story forward.
passages.content: NARRATION_A1_P03: // Nima still arrives, drawn to Ravi despite player rejection.
passages.author_notes: Ensures story progresses even if player ignored Ravi.

passages.emotional_beat: Nima notices player's presence. Assesses situation.
passages.content: NIMA_LINE_01_GREETING: // [High Empathy variant] 'Why are you telling strangers? We handle this ourselves.'
passages.author_notes: Nima is protective, guarded. Different from Ravi's openness.

passages.content: NIMA_LINE_02_GREETING: // [High Skepticism variant] 'Who is this? Another con artist?'
NIMA_LINE_03_GREETING: // [Balanced variant] 'You're just meeting Ravi? Welcome to our gravity well.'

passages.emotional_beat: Player chooses how to acknowledge Nima's arrival

choices.text: PLAYER_CHOICE_A1_C07: // Address Nima (e.g., 'Tell me about Ophina')
PLAYER_CHOICE_A1_C08: // Ask about their relationship (e.g., 'How long have you two...')
PLAYER_CHOICE_A1_C09: // Listen quietly (e.g., presence without questions)

passages.emotional_beat: Transition to marketplace story. All three now moving forward together.
passages.content: NARRATION_A1_P04: // They sit together. Prepare to tell the full story.
passages.author_notes: Act 1 closes. Leads directly to Act 2 Ophina reveal.
